params.name: engine

params.name: animSpeed

TRAVISO.name: TRAVISO
TRAVISO.description:
Namespace-class for [traviso.js](http://www.travisojs.com/).

Contains all traviso related properties and enumerations.

EngineView.name: EngineView
EngineView.description:
Main display object container class to hold all views
within the engine and all map related logic

params.name: config
params.description: configuration object for the isometric engine instance

props.name: mapDataPath
props.description: the path to the xml file that defines map data, required

MoveEngine.name: MoveEngine
MoveEngine.description:
Holds and manages all the logic for tween animations and map-object movement on the map.
This is created and used by EngineView instances.

params.name: engine
params.description: the engine instance that the animations will perform on

params.name: defaultSpeed
params.description: default speed for the map-objects to be used when they move on map

params.name: mapSizeC
params.description: number of columns

params.name: mapSizeR
params.description: number of rows

params.name: options
params.description: settings for the search algorithm

props.name: diagonal
props.description: Specifies whether to use diagonal tiles

classitems.description: A reference to the engine view that the map-object sits in.

classitems.description: Defines if the map-object is movable onto by other map-objects.

classitems.description: The height of the object in the first frame of its idle textures.

classitems.description: Animation speed for the movieclips included in the map-object visuals.

classitems.description: Changes the map-objects's texture(s) according to the specified direction-id and the state of the map-object (moving or stationary).
classitems.name: changeVisualToDirection

params.name: direction
params.description: direction-id as defined in 'TRAVISO.directions'

params.name: moving
params.description: if the requested visuals are for moving or stationary state

params.name: stopOnFirstFrame
params.description: if true stops on the first frame after changing the visuals

params.name: noLoop
params.description: if true the movieclip animation will not loop after the first animation

params.name: onAnimComplete
params.description: Callback function to call if 'noLoop' is true after the first run of the animation, uses the engine's 'callbackScope'

params.name: animSpeed
params.description: animation speed for the movieclips

classitems.description: Changes the map-objects's texture(s) according to the specified visual-id.
classitems.name: changeVisual

params.name: vId
params.description: visual-id

params.name: stopOnFirstFrame
params.description: if true stops on the first frame after changing the visuals

params.name: noLoop
params.description: if true the movieclip animation will not loop after the first animation

params.name: onAnimComplete
params.description: Callback function to call if 'noLoop' is true after the first run of the animation, uses the engine's 'callbackScope'

params.name: animSpeed
params.description: animation speed for the movieclips, stays the same if not defined

classitems.description: Configuration object for the isometric engine instance
classitems.name: config

subprops.name: minScale=0.5
subprops.description: mimimum scale that the DisplayObjectContainer for the map can get, default 0.5

subprops.name: maxScale=1.5
subprops.description: maximum scale that the DisplayObjectContainer for the map can get, default 1.5

subprops.name: minZoom=-1
subprops.description: minimum zoom level, engine defined

subprops.name: maxZoom=1
subprops.description: maximum zoom level, engine defined

subprops.name: zoomIncrement=0.5
subprops.description: zoom increment amount calculated by the engine according to user settings, default 0.5

subprops.name: numberOfZoomLevels=5
subprops.description: used to calculate zoom increment, defined by user, default 5

subprops.name: initialZoomLevel=0
subprops.description: initial zoom level of the map, default 0

subprops.name: instantCameraZoom=false
subprops.description: specifies wheather to zoom instantly or with a tween animation, default false

subprops.name: tileHeight=74
subprops.description: height of a single isometric tile, default 74

subprops.name: isoAngle=30
subprops.description: the angle between the topleft edge and the horizontal diagonal of a isometric quad, default 30

subprops.name: initialPositionFrame
subprops.description: frame to position the engine, default { x : 0, y : 0, w : 800, h : 600 }

subprops.name: initialPositionFrame.x
subprops.description: x position of the engine, default 0

subprops.name: initialPositionFrame.y
subprops.description: y position of the engine, default 0

subprops.name: initialPositionFrame.w
subprops.description: width of the engine, default 800

subprops.name: initialPositionFrame.h
subprops.description: height of the engine, default 600

subprops.name: pathFindingType=TRAVISO.pfAlgorithms.ASTAR_ORTHOGONAL
subprops.description: the type of path finding algorithm two use, default TRAVISO.pfAlgorithms.ASTAR_ORTHOGONAL

subprops.name: followCharacter=true
subprops.description: defines if the camera will follow the current controllable or not, default true

subprops.name: instantCameraRelocation=false
subprops.description: specifies wheather the camera moves instantly or with a tween animation to the target location, default false

subprops.name: instantObjectRelocation=false
subprops.description: specifies wheather the map-objects will be moved to target location instantly or with an animation, default false

subprops.name: highlightPath=true
subprops.description: highlight the path when the current controllable moves on the map, default true

subprops.name: highlightTargetTile=true
subprops.description: highlight the target tile when the current controllable moves on the map, default true

subprops.name: tileHighlightAnimated=true
subprops.description: animate the tile highlights, default true

subprops.name: mapDraggable=true
subprops.description: enable dragging the map with touch-and-touchmove or mousedown-and-mousemove on the map, default true

subprops.name: backgroundColor=null
subprops.description: background color, if defined the engine will create a solid colored background for the map, default null

subprops.name: useMask=false
subprops.description: creates a mask using the position frame defined by 'initialPositionFrame' property or the 'posFrame' parameter that is passed to 'repositionContent' method, default false

subprops.name: mapDataPath
subprops.description: the path to the xml file that defines map data, required

subprops.name: assetsToLoad=null
subprops.description: array of paths to the assets that are desired to be loaded by traviso, no need to use if assets are already loaded to PIXI cache, default null

subprops.name: callbackScope=null
subprops.description: the scope to apply when calling callback functions, default null

subprops.name: engineInstanceReadyCallback=null
subprops.description: callback function that will be called once everything is loaded and engine instance is ready, default null

subprops.name: tileSelectCallback=null
subprops.description: callback function that will be called when a tile is selected, default null

subprops.name: objectSelectCallback=null
subprops.description: callback function that will be called when a tile with an interactive map-object on it is selected, default null

subprops.name: objectReachedDestinationCallback=null
subprops.description: callback function that will be called when any moving object reaches its destination, default null

subprops.name: otherObjectsOnTheNextTileCallback=null
subprops.description: callback function that will be called when any moving object is in move and there are other objects on the next tile, default null

classitems.description: height of a single isometric tile
classitems.name: TILE_H

classitems.description: width of a single isometric tile
classitems.name: TILE_W

classitems.description: the angle between the topleft edge and the horizontal diagonal of a isometric quad
classitems.name: ISO_ANGLE

classitems.description: half-height of a single isometric tile
classitems.name: TILE_HALF_H

classitems.description: half-width of a single isometric tile
classitems.name: TILE_HALF_W

classitems.description: length of a single isometric tile's edge
classitems.name: TILE_ISO_EDGE_L

classitems.description: specifies wheather to zoom instantly or with a tween animation
classitems.name: instantCameraZoom

classitems.description: defines if the camera will follow the current controllable or not

classitems.description: specifies wheather the camera moves instantly or with a tween animation to the target location
classitems.name: instantCameraRelocation

classitems.description: specifies wheather the map-objects will be moved to target location instantly or with an animation
classitems.name: instantObjectRelocation

classitems.description: highlight the path when the current controllable moves on the map
classitems.name: highlightPath

classitems.name: highlightTargetTile

classitems.description: animate the tile highlights
classitems.name: tileHighlightAnimated

classitems.description: enable dragging the map with touch-and-touchmove or mousedown-and-mousemove on the map
classitems.name: mapDraggable

classitems.description: the scope to apply when calling callback functions
classitems.name: callbackScope

classitems.description: callback function that will be called once everything is loaded and engine instance is ready
classitems.name: engineInstanceReadyCallback

classitems.description: callback function that will be called when a tile is selected
classitems.name: tileSelectCallback

classitems.description: callback function that will be called when a tile with an interactive map-object on it is selected
classitems.name: objectSelectCallback

classitems.name: objectReachedDestinationCallback

classitems.description:
Enables adding external custom display objects to the specified location.
This method should be used for the objects that are not already defined in XML file and don't have a type-id.
The resulting object will be independent of engine mechanics apart from depth controls.
classitems.name: addCustomObjectToLocation

params.name: displayObject
params.description: object to be added to location

props.name: isMovableTo
props.description: if the object can be moved onto by other map-objects, default true

props.name: size
props.description: object that includes the size in rows and columns, default { c:1, r: 1 }

props.name: r
props.description: the size of the map-object in rows

props.name: c
props.description: the size of the map-object in columns

params.name: pos
params.description: object including r and c coordinates

props.name: r
props.description: the row index of the map location

props.name: c
props.description: the column index of the map location

classitems.description: Removes the object and its references from the map.
classitems.name: removeObjectFromLocation

params.name: obj
params.description: either an external display object or a map-object (ObjectView)

params.name: pos
params.description: object including r and c coordinates, if not defined the engine will use 'obj.mapPos' to remove the map-object

props.name: r
props.description: the row index of the map location

props.name: c
props.description: the column index of the map location

classitems.description:
Adds a reference of the given map-object to the given location in the object array.
This should be called when an object moved or transfered to the corresponding location.
Uses objects size property to add its reference to all relevant cells.

props.name: r
props.description: number of tiles that map-object covers vertically on the isometric map

params.description: object including r and c coordinates

props.name: r
props.description: the row index of the map location

props.name: c
props.description: the column index of the map location

Adds a reference of the given map-object to the given location in the object array.

props.name: r
props.description: the row index of the map location

props.name: c
props.description: the column index of the map location

classitems.description:
Removes references of the given map-object from the given location in the object array.
This should be called when an object moved or transfered from the corresponding location.
Uses objects size property to remove its references from all relevant cells.

props.name: r

props.description: the column index of the map location

params.name: delay
params.description: the amount of waiting before the tween animation starts, in seconds

params.description: type of the easing

params.name: overwrite
params.description: if the other tween animations assigned to the same object are going to be killed

params.name: onComplete

classitems.description:
Creates and returns an isometric engine instance with the provided configuration.
Also initialises traviso global settings if it hasn't been already.
classitems.name: getEngineInstance

params.name: instanceConfig
params.description: configuration object for the isometric instance

props.name: mapDataPath
props.description: the path to the xml file that defines map data, required

props.name: assetsToLoad
props.description: array of paths to the assets that are desired to be loaded by traviso, no need to use if assets are already loaded to PIXI cache, default null

props.name: minScale
props.description: mimimum scale that the DisplayObjectContainer for the map can get, default 0.5

props.name: maxScale
props.description: maximum scale that the DisplayObjectContainer for the map can get, default 1.5

props.name: numberOfZoomLevels
props.description: used to calculate zoom increment, default 5

props.name: initialZoomLevel
props.description: initial zoom level of the map, should be between -1 and 1, default 0

props.name: instantCameraZoom
props.description: specifies wheather to zoom instantly or with a tween animation, default false

props.name: tileHeight
props.description: height of a single isometric tile, default 74

props.name: isoAngle
props.description: the angle between the topleft edge and the horizontal diagonal of a isometric quad, default 30

props.name: initialPositionFrame
props.description: frame to position the engine, default { x : 0, y : 0, w : 800, h : 600 }

props.name: x
props.description: x position of the engine, default 0

props.name: y
props.description: y position of the engine, default 0

props.name: w
props.description: width of the engine, default 800

props.name: h
props.description: height of the engine, default 600

props.name: pathFindingType
props.description: the type of path finding algorithm two use, default TRAVISO.pfAlgorithms.ASTAR_ORTHOGONAL

props.name: followCharacter
props.description: defines if the camera will follow the current controllable or not, default true

props.name: instantCameraRelocation
props.description: specifies wheather the camera moves instantly or with a tween animation to the target location, default false

props.name: instantObjectRelocation
props.description: specifies wheather the map-objects will be moved to target location instantly or with an animation, default false

props.name: highlightPath
props.description: highlight the path when the current controllable moves on the map, default true

props.name: highlightTargetTile
props.description: highlight the target tile when the current controllable moves on the map, default true

props.name: tileHighlightAnimated
props.description: animate the tile highlights, default true

props.name: mapDraggable
props.description: enable dragging the map with touch-and-touchmove or mousedown-and-mousemove on the map, default true

props.name: backgroundColor
props.description: background color, if defined the engine will create a solid colored background for the map, default null

props.name: useMask
props.description: creates a mask using the position frame defined by 'initialPositionFrame' property or the 'posFrame' parameter that is passed to 'repositionContent' method, default false

props.name: callbackScope
props.description: the scope to apply when calling callback functions, default null

props.name: engineInstanceReadyCallback
props.description: callback function that will be called once everything is loaded and engine instance is ready, needs 'callbackScope' property, default null

props.name: tileSelectCallback
props.description: callback function that will be called when a tile is selected, needs 'callbackScope' property, default null

props.name: objectSelectCallback
props.description: callback function that will be called when a tile with an interactive map-object on it is selected, needs 'callbackScope' property, default null

props.name: objectReachedDestinationCallback
props.description: callback function that will be called when any moving object reaches its destination, needs 'callbackScope' property, default null

props.name: otherObjectsOnTheNextTileCallback
props.description: callback function that will be called when any moving object is in move and there are other objects on the next tile, needs 'callbackScope' property, default null

params.name: globalConfig
params.description: configuration object for the traviso engine

return.description: a new instance of the isometric engine

classitems.description: Initialises traviso global settings if it hasn't been already.
classitems.name: init

params.name: globalConfig
params.description: configuration object for the traviso engine

classitems.description: The direction IDs to be used in the engine
classitems.name: directions

subprops.name: O=0
subprops.description: idle no direction

subprops.name: S=1
subprops.description: south

subprops.name: SW=2
subprops.description: south west

subprops.name: W=3
subprops.description: west

subprops.name: NW=4
subprops.description: north west

subprops.name: N=5
subprops.description: north

subprops.name: NE=6
subprops.description: north east

subprops.name: E=7
subprops.description: east

subprops.name: SE=8
subprops.description: south east
